### Tender Announcement: Internal Audit Services
#### Procurement Reference Number: MX-42803676693
#### Solicitation Number: 202307004

**Notice Type:** Expired

**Notice Description:**
VIA Rail Canada Inc. invites submissions for internal audit services to assess the effectiveness of financial and human resource usage and the effectiveness of risk management in the execution of VIA's mandate. The services will be performed under the auditing committee and in compliance with generally accepted auditing standards set by the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA).

The scope of work includes assessing financial and human resource usage and risk management practices across VIA's operations. The successful contractor will develop and implement an audit plan, conduct reviews and assessments, and provide recommendations to the auditing committee.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders must register on [Merx.com](http://www.merx.com) website to access bidding documents and submit their offers.
* Fees may apply; please refer to [Merx.com](http://www.merx.com)'s pricing page for more information.

**Key Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: September 8, 2023, at 5:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: September 8, 2023

**Eligibility Criteria:** Bidders must have the necessary qualifications, experience, and expertise to perform the services.

**Selection Criteria:** The selection will be based on the bidder's qualifications, experience, and expertise, as well as the completeness and quality of their submission.

**Notice URL:** [https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2529928824/abstract?language=EN](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2529928824/abstract?language=EN) (English)

[https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2529928824/abstract?language=FR](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2529928824/abstract?language=FR) (French)

**Contact:** Gessy Houle, VIA Rail Canada Inc., gessy_houle@viarail.ca, 514-871-6071
